enWisdom: The worst attribute is bad etiquette
One whose etiquette decreases, his vices increase
One whose etiquette is bad, his honourable lineage gets tarnished

Wisdom: مَنْ طَلَبَ خِدْمَةَ السُّلْطَانِ بِغَيْرِ أَدَبٍ خَرَجَ مِنَ السَّلَامَةِ إِلَى الْعَطَبِ
enWisdom: One who seeks the favour of a king without [the proper] etiquette moves out from safety into harm

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَكُنْ أَفْضَلُ خِلَالِهِ أَدَبَهُ كَانَ أَهْوَنُ أَحْوَالِهِ عَطَبَهُ
enWisdom: One whose etiquette is not his best quality, his simplest condition will be his destruction

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَصْلُحْ عَلَى أَدَبِ اللَّهِ لَمْ يَصْلُحْ عَلَى أَدَبِ نَفْسِهِ
enWisdom: One who is not reformed by the discipline of Allah cannot become reformed through self-discipline
There is no honour with bad etiquette
One who has a dirty tongue has no etiquette
